alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Cass (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 7:38PM CDT until June 13 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN MILLER...NORTHERN CASS AND SOUTHERN BOWIE COUNTIES... At 738 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Naples, or 17 miles southwest of New Boston, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Wake Village, New Boston, Nash, Hooks, Redwater, Maud, Red Lick, Garland, Mandeville, Genoa, Leary, Mount Pleasant, Douglassville, Marietta, Domino, Spring Hill, Pleasant Hill, Red Bank and Bryans Mill. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
